item.description:
Membership not required

Hope it's ok to post this here if not let me know

A friend at work is organinzing a Poker run through Middleboro, Taunton, Mansfield, Fall River ending back in Middleboro. A suggested route is given but does not need to be followed, any route may be taken to the other lodges. Prizes awarded for the best poker hand. Donations are $15 per rider, sign-in is from 10-12pm Sunday June 26 at above address.

More information will be added as it becomes available
item.why: Donations go to the ElKs Scholarship Fund, playing Poker and Riding at the same time is fun!!
item.name: 1st Annual Scholarship Poker Run
